name: Frontier Academy
description:
Frontier Academy

This is a short game, made in 7 days for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021 (#dcjam2021)

https://itch.io/jam/dcjam2021

Important: Do not fight the blue Goblin in the second dungeon floor, as it will crash the game. And maybe take a look at the inlcuded readme.txt file, as I could answer questions about the gameplay.

A school where new recruits for the Frontier Ranges are trained. Heroes who protect and serve the pioneers and settlers, living at and beyond the borders of the known lands.

The wilds beyond the borders are rough, full of ancient evils, outcasts and horrible warlords. Many treasures can be found in the ruins of forgotten civilizations, while dark magic looms in the deep dungeons.

The game takes place at a new school, established to explore a previously inaccessible part of the world and you control some of the first new recruits, who will soon finish their training.

"Kei", "Doyle" and "Anbaru" will go on an adventure to brush up their skills before the last exams.

Will they succeed in their trial run or is there more danger lurking in the woods, than they anticipated?

You need a graphics card capable of OpenGL 4.4.
